name: github.com — Unlimited public repositories and unlimited private repositories (up to 3 collaborators) with Pipelines for CI/CD
bitbucket.org — Unlimited public and private Git repos for up to 5 users with Pipelines for CI/CD

pijul.com
description: Unlimited free and open source distributed version control system. Its distinctive feature is to be based on a sound theory of patches, which makes it easy to learn and use, and really distributed. Solves many problems of git/hg/svn/darcs.

name: chiselapp.com — Unlimited public and private Fossil repositories

description: Unlimited public and private Git repos

description: Unlimited public and private Git repos

name: algorithmia.com — Host algorithms for free. Includes free monthly allowance for running algorithms. Now with CLI support

Beeceptor
description: Mock a rest API in seconds, fake API response and much more. Free 50 requests per day, public dashboard, open endpoints (anyone having link to the dashboard can view requests and responses).

name: Bearer.sh
description: API Integrations built in minutes, monitored in real-time. With a universal API client, call any API in 2 minutes and monitor all your integrations from a simple dashboard.

name: bigml.com — Hosted machine learning algorithms. Unlimited free tasks for development, limit of 16 MB data/task

description: Enterprise-grade Public holiday API service for over 200 countries. Free plan includes 1000 calls per month.

name: Clarifai — Image API for custom face recognition and detection. Able to train AI models. Free plan has 5000 calls per month.
Colaboratory — Free web-based Python notebook environment with Nvidia Tesla K80 GPU.

dominodatalab.com — Data science with support for Python, R, Spark, Hadoop, MATLAB and others

dreamfactory.com — Open source REST API backend for mobile, web, and IoT applications. Hook up any SQL/NoSQL database, file storage system, or external service and it instantly creates a comprehensive REST API platform with live documentation, user management,...

FraudLabs Pro — Screen an order transaction for credit card payment fraud. This REST API will detect all possible fraud traits based on the input parameters of an order. Free Micro plan has 500 transactions per month.
FreeGeoIP.app
description: Completely free Geo IP information (JSON, CSV, XML). No registration required, 15000 queries per hour rate limit.

name: IP Geolocation — IP Geolocation API
description: Forever free plan for developers with 30k requests per month (1k/day) limit.

name: IP2Location — Freemium IP geolocation service. LITE database is available for free download. Import the database in server and perform local query to determine city, coordinates and ISP information.

IPinfo — Fast, accurate, and free (up to 100k/month) IP address data API. Offers APIs with details on geolocation, companies, carriers, IP ranges, domains, abuse contacts, and more. All paid APIs can be trialed for free.
IPList — Lookup details about any IP address, such as Geo IP information, tor addresses, hostnames and ASN details. Free for personal and business users.
IPTrace — An embarrassingly simple API that provides reliable and useful IP geolocation data for your business.
konghq.com/ — API Marketplace and powerful tools for private and public APIs. With the free tier, some features are limited such as monitoring, alerting and support
MailboxValidator — Email verification service using real mail server connection to confirm valid email. Free API plan has 300 verifications per month.
microlink.io – It turns any website into data such as metatags normalization, beauty link previews, scraping capabilities or screenshots as a service. 250 reqs/day every day free.
monkeylearn.com — Text analysis with machine learning, free 300 queries/month
myfakeapi.com — Free serverless API mocking service for developers

parsehub.com — Extract data from dynamic sites, turn dynamic websites into APIs, 5 projects free

description: API request builder - A free, fast, and beautiful alternative to Postman.

description: Feature Flags should be available for every developer at a low-cost. Releaseflags offers free releaseflags for single developers and a low-cost plan for startups.
